name: FocusableActionDetector
desc: A widget that combines the functionality of [Actions], [Shortcuts], [MouseRegion] and a [Focus] widget to create a detector that defines actions and key bindings, and provides callbacks for handling focus and hover highlights.

fields.name: enabled
fields.desc: Is this widget enabled or not.

fields.name: onShowFocusHighlight
fields.desc: A function that will be called when the focus highlight should be shown or hidden.

fields.name: onShowHoverHighlight
fields.desc: A function that will be called when the hover highlight should be shown or hidden.

fields.name: onFocusChange
fields.desc: A function that will be called when the focus changes.

fields.name: mouseCursor
fields.desc: The cursor for a mouse pointer when it enters or is hovering over the widget.

fields.name: child
fields.desc: The child widget for this [FocusableActionDetector] widget.
